FILE: cm160165v11.0.txt
DYAD: ARGENTINA-URUGUAY
RIVALRY: RIV368
DISPUTE(S): MID1094 
RIVALRY: RIV369
DISPUTE(S): MID1172 MID1808 

PS: 19009999-19910325 0.5 19910326-20209999 0.75

PS-UPDATE2020:

PSNOTES: MERCOSUR dyad 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20220218 
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20220218

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID1094 

TERRMID: MID1094 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID1094 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID1094 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID1094 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID1094 1 -- maritime MID
MARITMID-CER: MID1094 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: MID1094 this MID occurred at and was connected to the disputed island of Martin Gracia, but the island was disputed because of its implications for the disputed maritime boundary as the River Platte hits the coastline. Coded maritime MID because the disputed island is connected to the disputed maritime boundary. 

ISLMID: MID1094 1 -- islands MID
ISLMID-CER: MID1094 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: MID1094 from Schultz data, In early November 1907, Argentina seized a Uruguayan steam vessel at Martin Gracia, a small island in the River Platte. The ownership of the island was in dispute. Coded islands MID because this was connected to a disputed island. 

CIVWARMID: MID1094 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID1094 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID1094 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID1094 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID1094 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID1094 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID1094 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID1094 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 


MID1172 

TERRMID: MID1172 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID1172 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID1172 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID1172 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID1172 1 -- maritime MID
MARITMID-CER: MID1172 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: MID1172 this MID occurred at and was connected to the disputed island of Martin Gracia but the island was disputed because of its implications for the disputed maritime boundary as the River Platte hits the coastline. Coded maritime MID because the disputed island is connected to the disputed maritime boundary. 

ISLMID: MID1172 1 -- islands MID
ISLMID-CER: MID1172 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: MID1172 from Schultz data, on 1/25/1969, Uruguayan officials protested when Argentina landed troops on the disputed Martin Gracia island in the River Platte. The island is disputed by the two countries. Coded islands MID because this is connected to the disputed island. 

CIVWARMID: MID1172 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID1172 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID1172 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID1172 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID1172 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID1172 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID1172 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID1172 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 


MID1808 

TERRMID: MID1808 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID1808 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID1808 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID1808 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID1808 1 -- maritime MID
MARITMID-CER: MID1808 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: MID1808 from Schultz data, on 1/26/1973, Uruguay tried to seize an Argentine vessel in the Rio Plata waters claimed by Uruguay. This part of the river was disputed between Uruguay and Argentina. Coded maritime MID because this was connected to disputed waters. Note that the Rio de la Plata is not an inland river boundary; it is adjacent to the Atlantic Ocean and is formed where the Uruguay and Parana Rivers meet. The Rio Plata is essentially a gulf and does not play a role in delimiting land territory. 

ISLMID: MID1808 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID1808 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: MID1808 this MID did not involve disputed islands. 

CIVWARMID: MID1808 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID1808 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID1808 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID1808 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID1808 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID1808 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID1808 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID1808 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES:
